short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts selected text in text input boxes between Hebrew and English keyboard layouts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Users of bilingual keyboards often have accidentally set the wrong shift mode and type multiple letter or even words before realizing. Normallym this requires erasing and retyping the full incorrect text.

This extension lets you select the text, click right, and choose "Convert Selected Text" to automatically swap the text's language (based on the corresponding keyboard mapping).

The current version supports only Hebrew and English, but I can add more languages easily, if requested.
